description: A group of goblins ambushes travelers on the forest path
rewards: A torn map showing the way to the goblin cave

narrative.start: Suddenly, goblins leap from the underbrush with savage war cries!
narrative.victory: The goblins lie defeated. Searching their bodies, you find a torn piece of parchment that appears to be part of a map.
narrative.defeat: The goblins overwhelm you, but leave you unconscious rather than dead, perhaps saving you for ransom.
